verses.text: Let \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w arise|strong="H6965"\w*, let his \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w* be \w scattered|strong="H6327"\w*: let them also that \w hate|strong="H8130"\w* him \w flee|strong="H5127"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* him.\f + \fr 68.1 \ft before…: Heb. from his face\f*

As \w smoke|strong="H6227"\w* is driven \w away|strong="H5086"\w*, \add so\add* drive \add them\add* \w away|strong="H5086"\w*: as \w wax|strong="H1749"\w* \w melteth|strong="H4549"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, \add so\add* let the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w perish|strong="H0006"\w* at the \w presence|strong="H6440"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

But let the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* be \w glad|strong="H8055"\w*; let them \w rejoice|strong="H5970"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: yea, let them \w exceedingly|strong="H8057"\w* \w rejoice|strong="H7797"\w*.\f + \fr 68.3 \ft exceedingly…: Heb. rejoice with gladness\f*

\w Sing|strong="H7891"\w* unto \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, sing \w praises|strong="H2167"\w* to his \w name|strong="H8034"\w*: \w extol|strong="H5549"\w* him that \w rideth|strong="H7392"\w* upon the \w heavens|strong="H6160"\w* by his \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \nd \+w Jah|strong="H3050"\+w*\nd*, and \w rejoice|strong="H5937"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* him.

A \w father|strong="H0001"\w* of the \w fatherless|strong="H3490"\w*, and a \w judge|strong="H1781"\w* of the \w widows|strong="H0490"\w*, \add is\add* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* in his \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w habitation|strong="H4583"\w*.

\w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w setteth|strong="H3427"\w* the \w solitary|strong="H3173"\w* in \w families|strong="H1004"\w*: he bringeth \w out|strong="H3318"\w* those which are \w bound|strong="H0615"\w* with \w chains|strong="H3574"\w*: but the \w rebellious|strong="H5637"\w* \w dwell|strong="H7931"\w* in a \w dry|strong="H6707"\w* \add land\add*.\f + \fr 68.6 \ft in families: Heb. in a house\f*

O \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, when thou wentest \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, when thou didst \w march|strong="H6805"\w* through the \w wilderness|strong="H3452"\w*; \w Selah|strong="H5542"\w*:

The \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \w shook|strong="H7493"\w*, the \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w* also \w dropped|strong="H5197"\w* at the \w presence|strong="H6440"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: \add even\add* \w Sinai|strong="H5514"\w* \w itself|strong="H2088"\w* \add was moved\add* at the \w presence|strong="H6440"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

Thou, O \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, didst \w send|strong="H5130"\w* a \w plentiful|strong="H5071"\w* \w rain|strong="H1653"\w*, whereby thou didst \w confirm|strong="H3559"\w* thine \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*, when it was \w weary|strong="H3811"\w*.\f + \fr 68.9 \ft send: Heb. shake out\f*\f + \fr 68.9 \ft confirm: Heb. confirm it\f*

Thy \w congregation|strong="H2416"\w* hath \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* therein: thou, O \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, hast \w prepared|strong="H3559"\w* of thy \w goodness|strong="H2896"\w* for the \w poor|strong="H6041"\w*.

The \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* the \w word|strong="H0562"\w*: \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \add was\add* the \w company|strong="H6635"\w* of those that \w published|strong="H1319"\w* \add it\add*.\f + \fr 68.11 \ft company: Heb. army\f*

\w Kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w armies|strong="H6635"\w* did \w flee|strong="H5074"\w* \w apace|strong="H5074"\w*: and she that \w tarried|strong="H5116"\w* at \w home|strong="H1004"\w* \w divided|strong="H2505"\w* the \w spoil|strong="H7998"\w*.\f + \fr 68.12 \ft did…: Heb. did flee, did flee\f*

Though ye have \w lien|strong="H7901"\w* among the \w pots|strong="H8240"\w*, \add yet shall ye be as\add* the \w wings|strong="H3671"\w* of a \w dove|strong="H3123"\w* \w covered|strong="H2645"\w* with \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, and her \w feathers|strong="H0084"\w* with \w yellow|strong="H3422"\w* \w gold|strong="H2742"\w*.

When the \w Almighty|strong="H7706"\w* \w scattered|strong="H6566"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* in it, it was \add white\add* as \w snow|strong="H7949"\w* in \w Salmon|strong="H6756"\w*.\f + \fr 68.14 \ft in it…: or, for her, she\f*

The \w hill|strong="H2022"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \add is as\add* the \w hill|strong="H2022"\w* of \w Bashan|strong="H1316"\w*; an \w high|strong="H1386"\w* \w hill|strong="H2022"\w* \add as\add* the \w hill|strong="H2022"\w* of \w Bashan|strong="H1316"\w*.

Why \w leap|strong="H7520"\w* ye, ye \w high|strong="H1386"\w* \w hills|strong="H2022"\w*? \add this is\add* the \w hill|strong="H2022"\w* \add which\add* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w desireth|strong="H2530"\w* to dwell \w in|strong="H3427"\w*; yea, the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* will \w dwell|strong="H7931"\w* \add in it\add* for \w ever|strong="H5331"\w*.

The \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \add are\add* twenty \w thousand|strong="H7239"\w*, \add even\add* \w thousands|strong="H0505"\w* of \w angels|strong="H8136"\w*: the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \add is\add* among them, \add as in\add* \w Sinai|strong="H5514"\w*, in the \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \add place\add*.\f + \fr 68.17 \ft even…: or, even many thousands\f*

Thou hast \w ascended|strong="H5927"\w* on \w high|strong="H4791"\w*, thou hast led \w captivity|strong="H7628"\w* \w captive|strong="H7617"\w*: thou hast \w received|strong="H3947"\w* \w gifts|strong="H4979"\w* for \w men|strong="H0120"\w*; yea, \add for\add* the \w rebellious|strong="H5637"\w* also, that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3050"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* might \w dwell|strong="H7931"\w* \add among them\add*.\f + \fr 68.18 \ft for men: Heb. in the man\f*

\w Blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \add be\add* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w*, \add who\add* \w daily|strong="H3117"\w* \w loadeth|strong="H6006"\w* us \add with benefits, even\add* the \w God|strong="H0410"\w* of our \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w*. \w Selah|strong="H5542"\w*.

\add He that is\add* our \w God|strong="H0410"\w* \add is\add* the \w God|strong="H0410"\w* of \w salvation|strong="H4190"\w*; and unto \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \add belong\add* the \w issues|strong="H8444"\w* from \w death|strong="H4194"\w*.

But \w God|strong="H0430"\w* shall \w wound|strong="H4272"\w* the \w head|strong="H7218"\w* of his \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*, \add and\add* the \w hairy|strong="H8181"\w* \w scalp|strong="H6936"\w* of such an one as goeth on \w still|strong="H1980"\w* in his \w trespasses|strong="H0817"\w*.

The \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, I will bring \w again|strong="H7725"\w* from \w Bashan|strong="H1316"\w*, I will bring \add my people\add* \w again|strong="H7725"\w* from the \w depths|strong="H4688"\w* of the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*:

That thy \w foot|strong="H7272"\w* may be \w dipped|strong="H4272"\w* in the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* of \add thine\add* \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*, \add and\add* the \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w* of thy \w dogs|strong="H3611"\w* in the same.\f + \fr 68.23 \ft dipped: or, red\f*

They have \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* thy \w goings|strong="H1979"\w*, O \w God|strong="H0430"\w*; \add even\add* the \w goings|strong="H1979"\w* of my \w God|strong="H0410"\w*, my \w King|strong="H4428"\w*, in the \w sanctuary|strong="H6944"\w*.

The \w singers|strong="H7891"\w* went \w before|strong="H6923"\w*, the players on \w instruments|strong="H5059"\w* \add followed\add* \w after|strong="H0310"\w*; \w among|strong="H8432"\w* \add them were\add* the \w damsels|strong="H5959"\w* playing with \w timbrels|strong="H8608"\w*.

\w Bless|strong="H1288"\w* ye \w God|strong="H0430"\w* in the \w congregations|strong="H4721"\w*, \add even\add* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w*, from the \w fountain|strong="H4726"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.\f + \fr 68.26 \ft from…: or, ye that are of the fountain of Israel\f*

There \add is\add* \w little|strong="H6810"\w* \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w* \add with\add* their \w ruler|strong="H7287"\w*, the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \add and\add* their \w council|strong="H7277"\w*, the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* of \w Zebulun|strong="H2074"\w*, \add and\add* the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* of \w Naphtali|strong="H5321"\w*.\f + \fr 68.27 \ft and their…: or, with their company\f*

Thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* thy \w strength|strong="H5797"\w*: \w strengthen|strong="H5810"\w*, O \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, that \w which|strong="H2098"\w* thou hast \w wrought|strong="H6466"\w* for us.
Because of thy \w temple|strong="H1964"\w* at \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* shall \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w bring|strong="H2986"\w* \w presents|strong="H7862"\w* unto thee.

\w Rebuke|strong="H1605"\w* the \w company|strong="H2416"\w* of \w spearmen|strong="H7070"\w*, the \w multitude|strong="H5712"\w* of the \w bulls|strong="H0047"\w*, with the \w calves|strong="H5695"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \add till every one\add* \w submit|strong="H7511"\w* himself with \w pieces|strong="H7518"\w* of \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*: \w scatter|strong="H0967"\w* thou the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \add that\add* \w delight|strong="H2654"\w* in \w war|strong="H7128"\w*.\f + \fr 68.30 \ft the company…: or, the beasts of the reeds\f*\f + \fr 68.30 \ft scatter…: or, he scattereth\f*

\w Princes|strong="H2831"\w* shall come \w out|strong="H0857"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*; \w Ethiopia|strong="H3568"\w* shall soon stretch \w out|strong="H7323"\w* her \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* unto \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

\w Sing|strong="H7891"\w* unto \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, ye \w kingdoms|strong="H4467"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*; O sing \w praises|strong="H2167"\w* unto the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w*; \w Selah|strong="H5542"\w*:

To him that \w rideth|strong="H7392"\w* upon the \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w* of \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w*, \add which were\add* of \w old|strong="H6924"\w*; lo, he doth send \w out|strong="H5414"\w* his \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*, \add and that\add* a \w mighty|strong="H5797"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*.\f + \fr 68.33 \ft send…: Heb. give\f*

\w Ascribe|strong="H5414"\w* ye \w strength|strong="H5797"\w* unto \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: his \w excellency|strong="H1346"\w* \add is\add* over \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and his \w strength|strong="H5797"\w* \add is\add* in the \w clouds|strong="H7834"\w*.\f + \fr 68.34 \ft clouds: or, heavens\f*

O \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \add thou art\add* \w terrible|strong="H3372"\w* out of thy holy \w places|strong="H4720"\w*: the \w God|strong="H0410"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \add is\add* he that \w giveth|strong="H5414"\w* \w strength|strong="H5797"\w* and \w power|strong="H8592"\w* unto \add his\add* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*. \w Blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \add be\add* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.
